org.jasig.cas.logout

Class SamlCompliantLogoutMessageCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.logout.SamlCompliantLogoutMessageCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogoutMessageCreator

    public final class SamlCompliantLogoutMessageCreator
extends Object
implements LogoutMessageCreator
    A builder that uses the saml standard's LogoutRequest template in order to build the logout request.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
